Derived.Armor: Combines item defense and toughness; reduces incoming damage
Derived.Boon Duration: Increases duration of your applied boons
Derived.Condition Duration: Increases duration of your applied conditions

Special.Gold Find: Increases the amount of gold gained from killing enemies.
Special.Karma Gain: Increases the amount of karma gained from completing events.
Special.Magic Find: Increases chance to find rare items
Special.XP Gain: Increases the amount of experience gained from killing enemies.
